text: Kadı Hazretleri, fıkıh binaen infazın ertelenip...

english: ...then our first task will be to rescue Mr. Aliyar and Mr. Kutluca from there.

- Vasily, I'm-- - Stay with me here.

My job is to keep the state single.

text: Buna haddini aşanlara haddini bildirmek de dahildir.
english: This includes modesty for the transgressors.

text: Sultanımızın gayesine hizmet etmek de buna dahildir, değil mi Emir Hazretleri?
english: That includes serving the Sultan's cause, doesn't it, Your Highness?

text: O vakit müsaade edin, Türkmen obalarını sizin gücünüz...
english: Then allow the Turkmen villages to be your power...
...and gather it together with your power.

text: Eğer bunu yaparsanız, sonuna kadar arkanızda oluruz.
english: If you do that, we'll be right behind you.

text: Nicedir hesabını yaptığım bir meseledir bu.
english: That's one thing I've been doing.
It hasn't been a lot so far.

text: Lakin görürüm ki vakit bu iş için münasiptir.
english: But I see the time is right for this.

text: O vakit Türkmen obalarına haber edesiniz.
english: Then you'll be able to contact the Turkmen villages.

text: O vakit bana müsaade Emir Hazretleri.
english: Then I have a moment, Your Highness.

text: ...bana en baştan beri güvenmediğini ikimiz de biliriz.
english: ...we both know you didn't trust me from the beginning.

text: Bizim dostluğumuz da, düşmanlığımız da Allah rızası içindir Emir Hazretleri.
english: Our friendship and our enmity are for the pleasure of Allah, O my Lord.

text: İstikameti hak olan herkes bizim dostumuzdur.
english: Anyone who deserves to be restored is our friend.

text: Batuhan adında bir Türk geldi. Sizi görmek ister.
english: A Turk named Batuhan has arrived.
I have something to tell you, Tekafur Vasilius.
Come on, Batuhan, you know what?
Tell me, what did you say?

text: Ertuğrul Bey'le Aliyar Bey'in ittifakından haberdarsınızdır.
english: You are aware of the alliance between Ertuğrul Bey and Aliyar Bey.

text: Bu ittifaktan rahatsız olduğunuzu da bilirim.
english: I know you're upset about this alliance.
But first, I'd like to say something.

text: Ben işimi bitirip Ural Bey'in kellesini ve...
english: I'll finish my job and I'll get Mr. Ural's head and...
...when I took over the command of the Guard...
I want to know if you'll be there for me.

text: Ertuğrul Bey'le Aliyar Bey birlik olursa...
english: If you and Mr. Ertuğrul are united...
...because he's gonna come out to you.

text: Yani ben bey olursam size mesele çıkarmam diyorsun, öyle mi?
english: So you're saying that if I'm a gentleman, I won't cause trouble?

text: Başınızı dahi ağrıtacak bir iş yapmam.
english: I'm not doing anything that's gonna hurt your head.
...who escaped from the Urals, and then...

text: ...onun kellesi için benimle pazarlığa tutuşan biri mi söylüyor Batuhan?
english: ...is it someone who negotiates with me for his head, Batuhan?

text: Ural bana ihanet etti. Sözünde durmadı.
english: The Ural betrayed me, he didn't keep his word.
He's brought all his crimes on me, Tekfur.
So tell me, and let's hear it.
...to be aware of every move of the Urals.
You don't know what to do with your anger.
I'll keep an eye on you.
The order is Sadeddin, Your Dogs.
I beat this knife for you.
I've got the stake decorated myself.
May your majesty be blessed, Mr. Aliyar.
You have made a great effort, Your Highness.

text: Bu beylik meselesini hallettiğimize göre Konya'ya dönmeden...
english: After we've settled this gentlemanly matter before we return to Konya...

text: ...Aslıhan Hatun'la olan hayırlı işimizi tamama erdirelim derim.
english: ...and I say we finish our good work with Aslihan Khatun.

text: Ne oldu Ural, bu hâlin nedir?
english: What's the matter with the Ural, what's the matter with you?
He hasn't been around since the morning.

text: Daha beyliğinin ilk gününde bacın kaybolmuştur, haberin yok.
english: You don't know your sister disappeared on the first day of your lordship.

text: Dua et de başına bir iş gelmiş olmasın.
english: Pray that you don't get hurt.

text: Hele bir ne olduğunu anlayalım abi.
english: Let's see what's going on, man.
Mr. Aliyar is telling the truth.
Aslihan Hatun is a man of his mind.

text: Ortadan yok olduysa, mutlaka makul bir izahı vardır.
english: If it's gone, there's a reasonable explanation.

text: Tez her yere bakın, herkese sorun.
Çavdar Obası Alplerinin çoğu benim emrimdedir.
english: Most of the Squaw Valley Alps are under my command.

text: Bugay ve adamlarına ne dersem yapmaya hazırdırlar.
english: Bugey and his men are ready to do whatever I tell them to do.

text: Ural ve Aliyar'ı tuzağa çekip, Alplerimle işlerini bitireceğim.
english: I will trap the Ural and the Aliyar and end their business with my Alps.

text: Birbirinden nefret eden iki kardeşi aynı tuzağa çekeceksin, öyle mi?
english: You're gonna trap two brothers who hate each other in the same trap, right?

text: Peki, bunu nasıl yapacaksın, yani ikisini aynı yere nasıl çekeceksin?
english: So, how are you gonna do that, so how are you gonna pull them both together?

text: İkisinin de ortak bir acısı var Tekfur.
english: They both have a common pain, Tekfur.

text: İkisi de her yerde Aslıhan'ı arıyorlar.
english: They're both looking for Aslihan everywhere.

text: Emir Sadeddin'in nişanlısı, Aslıhan'ı mı kaçırdın?
english: You kidnapped Aslihan, the fiancée of Emir Sadeddin?

text: Kaçırmadım Tekfur, kaçırmadım. Aslıhan bana sevdalıdır.
english: I didn't take it, Tekfur, I didn't take it, aslihan is loving me.
...forced him to marry Sadeddin the Dog.

text: Ee, Aslıhan da evlenmek istemediği için bana kaçtı.
english: Well, Aslihan ran away from me because he didn't want to marry me.
But no one knows it's like that.

text: Bugay, Aliyar ve Ural'a Aslıhan'ın mendilini götürecek...
english: Bugay will take Aslihan's handkerchief to the Allies and the Urals...
...and he'll say he found a trail.

text: Onlar da bacıları Aslıhan'ı kurtarmak için koşarak tuzağıma gelecekler.
english: They will come to me in a trap, running to save their sisters Aslihan.

text: Yanlarındaki Alplerin hepsi de benim için çalışan Bugay'ın adamları olacak.
english: All the Alps that are with them will be Bugay's men working for me.
You have managed to impress me, Batuhan.

text: Anlaşılan o ki oyununu kurmuşsun bile, bana ne gerek var?
english: Apparently, you've already set up your game, so what do I need?
I'm gonna need your support right here.

text: Bugay ve Alpleri bu iş için benden altın isteyecekler.
english: Bugay and the Alps will ask me for gold for this.

text: Siz bana borç olarak altın verin.
Ben de size Aliyar'la Ural'ın kellesini.
english: I'll give you the head of the Alyar and the Urals.

text: Peki, benim bundan çıkarım ne olacak?
english: So what's my take on that?
How are you gonna pay it back?

text: Ertuğrul Bey'in altın madeninden çıkaracağım altınlarla ödeyeceğim elbet.
english: I will pay with the gold I will extract from the gold mine of Ertuğrul Bey.

text: Altın madeni mi? Ertuğrul'un altın madeni mi var?
english: Do you have a gold mine?

text: Lakin, Ural madeni bastırınca işe ara verildi.
english: However, when the Ural mine was pressed, the work was stopped.
It's a very long subject, Tekfur.
(Batuhan) I can't tell you where now.

text: Evvela bir işimi bitireyim, sonra yanınıza geleceğim.
english: I'll finish a job first, then I'll come to you.

text: Hem madenin, hem de Hanlı Pazar'ın ortaklığını konuşuruz.
english: We'll discuss the partnership of the mine and Hanli Sande.

text: İmdi, bana destek olacak mısın Tekfur?
english: Umdi, will you support me, Tekfur?
You've managed to convince me, Batuhan.

text: Borcunu ödemeden sakın öleyim deme ha.
english: Don't let me die before I pay your debt.

text: Aslıhan'la düğünümü yapıp obanın başına geçince...
english: When I got married to Aslihan and went to the bathroom...

text: Çabuk, çabuk şu adamın peşine birini takın.
english: Hurry, hurry, get someone after this guy.
Don't I recognize that dog's name?

text: İyi de neden geldi ki buraya?
english: But why did he come here?
He's obviously here to see Vasilius.
We need to get this word out to the village.

text: Obanın civarını didik didik ettik. Lakin hiçbir iz bulamadık.
english: We dug around the room, but we found no trace.

text: Nereye gider bu hatun ha, nereye?
Bugay ve Alpler gece boyunca aramaya devam edecekler beyim.
english: Bugey and the Alps will keep looking for you all night, sir.
As long as Aslihan Hatun is not found...
...no one will return to the village.

text: Aslıhan bacım durup dururken obadan ayrılmaz.
english: My sister, as a matter of fact, never leaves the village.
What do you think, Mr. Aliyar?
If he hasn't come back by now...
...what else is to be done, Your Highness?
Who is going to kidnap Aslihan...

text: Abi, senin muhakkak bildiğin bir şey vardır.
english: Brother, there's something you must know.

text: Bir düşmanın, sana garezi olan biri var mı?
english: Do you have an enemy, someone who hates you?
...he can't dare to touch my brother.
The Ural, if there's one, for example...
My sister, as a matter of fact...
We like it, Mom. We like it.
We heard, we're in the garden, son.

text: O Ural, bey olacak diye çok korkmuştuk.
english: We were so afraid that he would be a gentleman in the Urals.

text: Bunun şerefine akşam bir toy vereceğiz.
english: We're having a wedding tonight in his honor.
It's gonna be a little hard for you, but...

text: O nasıl söz beyim, ne zahmeti.
english: He's a very good man, and he's not a very good man.

text: Ben hemen ilgilenir, akşama kalmadan bütün işleri hallederim.
english: I'll take care of it right away, I'll get it all done before evening.

text: Sen merak etme oğul, biz her şeyi hallederiz.
english: Don't worry, son, we'll take care of it.

text: Hadi Gündüz'üm, babanın işi var, gidelim biz.
english: Come on, Sunny, your father's got a job, let's go.

text: Gayri ben babamla iş konuşacağım ana.
english: I'm going to talk to my dad about business, Mom.

text: Siz yemekleri hazır edin, gelmeyeceğim ben.
english: You guys make the food, I'm not coming.

text: Ee, iyi o vakit, kolay gelsin size.
english: Well, well, then, let it be easy for you.

text: Hayırlısıyla bir imtihandan daha alnımızın akıyla çıktık.
english: We're just out of the blue for a little more testing.

text: Ya sen de kardeşim, bir vukuat var mıdır?

We're not gonna rely on the peer.

text: Ya sen Gündüz Alp, sen de talim yapar mısın?
english: What about you, the Day Alps, you train?

Tell Mr. Ertuğrul what's going on.
Tell him I want his help.

text: Alpleri bir şey görür, duyar ya da bulurlarsa hemen bize desinler.
english: If the Alps see or hear or find anything, let them tell us.

You're the one who orders it, sir.
Is it time for dinner, you bastard?
Get out of here! Get out!

english: What do I have to do with my sister's kidnapping, Your Honor?

text: En yakınındaki adam dahi sana ihanet eder.

text: Bu Batuhan'ın şerefsizliğidir, benim beceriksizliğim değil.
english: This is Batuhan's disgrace, not mine.

text: Kaldı ki bacımı kaçıranın o olduğunu da bilmeyiz.
english: We don't know if he's the one who took my sister.

text: Eşkıya olaydı şimdiye çoktan fidye haberi gelirdi, ahmak!
english: If it was a pawn, the ransom would be out by now, you idiot!

text: Bunun bedelini yalnız o Batuhan denen it değil...

text: Kayı Obası'nın şerefli erleri, yiğitleri, hatunları.

text: Çok şükür nicedir arar olduğumuz huzurumuzu bulduk.

...we're all around this fine dining table together.
... our unity is my strength, our home is joy.

english: Mr. Aliyar, you have been elected lord of the Shipyard.

text: Gayrı iki obanın da dertleri sona ermiştir.

text: (Hep bir ağızdan) Ertuğrul Bey'im çok yaşa!
english: (All of a sudden) My Lord Ertuğrul, long live!

"This is what the old man says".

english: When we get married, I'll make you live in paradise.

This is a very serious decision.

english: But as I count the days I'll see you...
I don't want you to be sad.

While I was waiting, to remind me...

english: Now he wants to marry Tekfur's daughter.
...is there any heart in this, Bamshi?

text: Beyim, o Vasilius, Helena'yı sevdiğinden değil...

english: ...who wants Helena to take the castle for granted.

text: O vakit bu iş olmaz Bamsı.
Kimde gönlü varsa onunla evlendirmek bizim vazifemizdir.
english: It is our duty to marry anyone who has a heart.
You're right, sir, you are right.
Helena has no heart for that Vasilius.
I'm gonna give you a job now.

text: Malum kalenin yolunu en iyi sen bilirsin.
english: You know the way to the Knowlem Castle best.
Let Helena know I suspect Vasilius.

text: Bunu babasına olan saygımdan söylediğimi de iletesin.
english: And tell him I said this out of respect for his father.
Give these gold to the Crusader Master.
Completing the shortages of the store.

text: Kalenin en güçlü tüccarı haline gelsin.
english: He's the strongest merchant in the castle.
Come on, Abdurrahman, you know what?
We have word from the fort, sir.
Batuhan has arrived at the fort.

text: Dumrul, onun Vasilius ile görüştüğünü söyler.
english: Dumrul says he's meeting with Vasilius.

text: Zira çıkışta da peşinde biri varmış.
Belli ki Vasilius peşine adam takmış.
english: It's clear that Vasilius has a man behind him.
Quick, quickly, let me out of here.
I have a warrant for Aslihan Hatun.
Why did you do this, Batuhan?
Take these gold and distribute them to the Alps.
How can you be with this bastard?
My dad loved you very much.

text: Sen onun en iyi Alplerinden biriydin.
english: You were one of his best Alps.
He's always been there for you.

text: Babanın da, o eli kanlı ağabeyinin de yıllarca pisliğini çektik.
english: We've been through your father's filth for years, and your brother's for years.

My lord Aliyar is suspicious of Batuhan.

english: Being a gentleman is not easy.

text: İnşallah Aslıhan Hatun'u da sağ salim bulurlar da...
english: I hope they find Aslihan Khatun safe and sound...
...these black clouds are going to be scattered.

text: Başlarında Aliyar Bey vardır. Sen neden gidersin?
english: They have Mr. Aliyar in their heads.

text: Biz kardeşsek iyi günde de, kötü günde de kardeşiz.

text: Şimdi Aliyar Bey'in müşkülüne çare olmaya giderim.

text: Ya Rab, ya Rahim, ya Şafi, ya Hazi.
english: Lord, or the Merciful, or the Shafi, or the Hazi.
(The voice of Ibn 'Arabi) is the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.

text: (İbn-i Arabi dış ses) Doğrusu biz sana apaçık bir fetih ihsan ettik.
english: We have indeed given you a clear victory.

text: (İbn-i Arabi dış ses) Böylece Allah, senin geçmiş ve gelecek günahını bağışlar...
english: (Ibn-i-Arab) so that Allah may forgive your past and future sins.
...and will guide you on the right path.

text: (İbn-i Arabi dış ses) Ve sana Allah şanlı bir zaferle yardım eder.
english: And Allah will help you with a mighty victory.

text: (İbn-i Arabi dış ses) İmanlarına iman katsınlar diye...

english: He is the One who sent down security into the hearts of the believers.

text: (İbn-i Arabi dış ses) Göklerin ve yerin orduları Allah'ındır.
english: To Allah belong the armies of the heavens and the earth.
He is the One who has made all things with wisdom.
I lost my way in the woods.

text: Allah, yolumuzdan şaşmayalım diye bahşetmedi mi ayetlerini?
english: Has not God given us His signs so that we may not go astray from Our way?

text: Âdemoğlu çok kez yolunu kaybetti evlat.
english: The son of man has lost his way many times, son.

text: Tevhitten şaşıp kendi elleriyle yaptığı putlara taptı.
english: He was amazed at the way he was taught and worshipped the idols he had made with his own hands.
And is not hasty in punishing.
So that the Son of Man may not be misled by the disbelief.

text: ...yüce kitabımız Kur'an-ı Kerim'i indirerek rahmet etti.
english: Our Book has revealed the Quran, the Most Gracious,
The Prophet gave guidance to our Lord.
Listen to this last call and...
...the believers who have not deviated from the guidance of Allah.
...they were willing to help the Quran.

text: Onlar hem bu hayatın hem ebedi hayatın muzafferleridir.
english: They are the winners of this life and the Everlasting Life.

text: Zorluklar karşısında aldığım kararlar belimi bükse de...
english: I'm not sure what I'm going to do when I'm faced with the challenges.
I never thought I was alone.
Surely Allah is with you, O Ertuğrul.
He tests His servants whom He loves.
If you're not tempted, if you're not bothered...

text: ...ve rahatın yerindeyse bilesin ki bir mesele vardır.
english: And if you're comfortable, you know there's a problem.
...sleeps in the slumber and ruins his prideful life.
I'm going to be a little late.
We are not afraid of trouble, of trouble, oh my God.
And we wait for your reward from Allah.

text: Başındaki musibetler bir bir dağılmakta Ertuğrul.

english: What you see is the enemy.
...they're gonna beat you to the punch...

text: Bu seni şaşırtmasın ve kibre sürüklemesin.
english: Don't let it surprise you or make you proud.
My Lord has made me a slave to my soul,
I'm going to be a little late.
I'm going to be a little late.
I'd like to see what you have.
I'd like to see your stuff.
Of course, welcome to the house, sir.

text: E buyurun, bizde her ne isterseniz vardır.
english: Come on, we have whatever you want.
I like it. I like it.

text: Şimdi siz bundan bana 40 katır yükleyesiniz.
english: Now you're charging me 40 times that.
I'd like to ask you for a loaded item...

text: Ee, şimdi bu altınlarla işlerinizi büyütesiniz.
english: So, now you can grow your business with this gold.

text: Sizinle daha çok çalışacağız Alvin Usta.
english: We'll work with you more, Master Alvin.

text: Bu verdiğiniz altınlarla şehrin en büyük tüccarı olup...
english: This is the biggest gold merchant in town that you've given...
...and I will serve you with honor again.

text: İçinde nice dertlere deva macun vardır.
english: There's a lot of trouble in it.
We don't need food, for God's sake.
I didn't translate, I got it.

text: Şifalı nimetlerinizden daha çok almak isterim.
english: I'd like to receive more of your healing blessings.
All right, come on, come on, give me the goddamn time.
- Come on back here again. - Ha, good.

text: Beyim, Bugay Alp bir iz bulmuştur.
english: Sir, Bugy Alp has found a trail.

text: Bugay bir iz bulmuş Emir Hazretleri.
english: The Bugey found a trail, Your Highness.
We found this bloody handkerchief, sir.

text: (Aslıhan dış ses) Nihayet menziline eriştin Ertuğrul Bey.
english: (Shouting out loud) You finally reached your destination, Mr. Ertuğrul.

text: İnşallah kendi obanı felaketlere sürüklediğin gibi...
english: I hope you're just like your own mother in disaster.
...and you can't lead our city to disaster.

text: (Aslıhan dış ses) İmdi varın gidin, otağımızda Aliyar'la zaferinizi kutlayın.
english: (Applause) Now come and celebrate your victory with Aliyar in our room.

text: Aslıhan Hatun'u son gördüğümüz yer burası değil mi Turgut?
english: This is the last place we saw Aslihan Hatun, isn't it, Turgut?
So where does this road go?
To the cemetery of the Scavenger's Chamber.
I saw the Ural when I brought it to the funeral.
We'll go to the cemetery before we leave the mansion, Turgut.
Where did you find this handkerchief, Bugay?
I'm on the way to Blind Valley.

text: Beni tez mendili bulduğun yere götür.
english: Take me where you found the thesis.
He's waiting in front of the room.
We'll be on our way soon.

text: Eğer Batuhan'sa kellesini almak bana düşer.
english: If it's Batuhan, I'll have to take his head.

text: Aliyar Bey, Aslıhan Hatun'u bulmadan obaya dönmeyin.
english: Aliyar, do not return to the village until you find Aslihan Khatun.
We'll be back with good news.
Sir, what are we looking for?

text: Aslıhan Hatun dün belli ki bana ve Aliyar Bey'e öfkesinden dolayı...
english: Aslihan Hatun was angry with me and Aliyar yesterday.
...was at the tomb of Mr. Candar.
What is the grave of Mr. Candar?
This is a girl's dagger, sir.
Could it have been Batuhan, sir?
We'll find out about that, Turgut.
To take revenge on the Ural...

text: Ne uğursuz adammış ki kirinden, pasından nasibini almayan kalmadı.
english: Woe to him who does not receive his portion from his uncleanness!
It's cool in here at night.

text: Donup kalmış. En fazla bir günlüktür.
english: It's frozen, at most, a day.

text: Atlardan biri yüklü, diğeri boşmuş. Çukurundan belli.
english: One of the horses is loaded and the other is empty.

text: Belli ki baygın olduğu için Aslıhan Hatun'u kendi atına almış.
english: He obviously took Aslihan Hatun on his own horse because he was unconscious.
He took the other one with him.

text: İzleri takip edin. Biz de hemen obaya varalım Turgut.
english: Follow the trail, and we'll get to the village now, Turgut.
You're the one who orders it, sir.

text: (Bamsı iç ses) Hey yüceler yücesi Rabbim...
english: O my Lord, the Most High!
...you are the creator of all things, all things.

text: (Bamsı iç ses) Gündüzü, geceyi, güneşi, ayı yarattın.
english: You created the day and the night, the sun and the moon.

text: (Bamsı iç ses) Devri âlemini gördükçe şu cücük kadar beynimle sana iman etmişim.
english: (Baby inward voice) As I saw the world of cycles, I believed in you with my brain as small as this.
My Lord, do not let the disbelievers

text: ...yoldan çıkmışların şerrinden sen bizleri koruyasın ya Rabbim.
english: Lord, protect us from the evil of the deviants.

text: (Bamsı iç ses) Helena'mı düştüğü bu gayya kuyusundan...
english: (Baby whispers) From this gay well where my Helena fell...

text: Güneş mi yoksa sen mi gözlerimi alırsın onu düşünürdüm.
english: I thought it was the sun or you that would take my eyes off me.

text: Buraya benimle konuşmak için mi geldin?
english: You came here to talk to me?
I have something to tell you.
If you could just listen to me a little bit...

text: ...ben bu toprakları sana gözüm kapalı veririm.
english: ...I'll give you this land with my eyes closed.

text: Ural denen o ihtiraslı ahmakla iş yapar mıyım ben?
english: Am I doing business with that greedy fool called Ural?

text: Kendisine hayrı olmayanın, kardeşlerine hayrı olmayanın...
english: Whoever does not do good to himself, or to his brothers...

text: ...obasına hayrı olmayanın bana mı hayrı olacak?
english: ...which is not good for the world, is good for me?
- Mr. Ertugrul is here, Your Highness.
Ertuğrul Bey, they have kidnapped Aslihan Hatun.
Where did they find this handkerchief?
I heard it called the Blind Valley.

text: Aliyar'la Ural Beyler Alpleriyle birlikte oraya doğru yola koyuldular.
english: Aliyar and the Ural gentlemen with the Alps headed for it.
This is a trap, Your Honor.

text: Sen ne dersin? Ne dersin Ertuğrul Bey?
english: What do you think, Mr. Ertuğrul?

text: Elbette. Aslıhan Hatun'undur. Nerede buldun bunu?
english: Of course, it belongs to Aslihan Hatun.
Aslihan was the one who kidnapped Hatun.
Aslihan Hatun resisted to be kidnapped.

text: Orada kayanın üzerinde kan izi bulduk.
english: We found blood on the rock.

text: Aynı zamanda ata bindirildiği yerde de kan izi bulduk.
english: We also found blood on the horse.
Batuhan, there can be no other.
...in the opposite direction from the Valley of the Blind.

text: İzleri takip etmeleri için Alplerimi görevlendirdim.
english: I've assigned my Alps to track them.

text: Bu mendili oraya koyan her kimse...
english: Anyone who puts this sign in there...

text: Yahut bunu Aliyar Bey'e getiren her kimse...
english: Or whoever brought this to Mr. Aliyar...

text: Belki de Batuhan'la bir olup iş tutmuşlardır.
english: Maybe they're in business with Batuhan.
We need to move before it's too late.
I'm going to the Blind Valley right now.

text: ...askerlerinizi Aslıhan Hatun'u aramak için görevlendirdiğinizi duydum.
english: ...I heard you've deployed your troops to search for Aslihan Khatun.

text: Bin türlü hâl var. Sizi koruyamam.
english: There are a thousand different ways.

text: Bu topraklarda senden daha güvenilir kimi bulayım?
english: Who can I find more reliable in this land?

text: Merak etmeyesin. İki askerimle yaverim Cabir buradalar.
english: Don't worry, I've got two soldiers here, baby Cabir.
Don't make me that bastard's ass.
(Sighs) Take my life to save me.
How am I supposed to look at Mr. Ertugrul's face?

text: Babamın, Ural abimin utancıyla nasıl yaşarım ben?
english: How can I live with the shame of my father, my brother Ural?
How can I live, my Lord?
We've lost track of them, brothers.
What are we gonna do now, Native Alps?

text: İzleri yine bulup takip edeceğiz kardeş.
english: We'll track them down again, brother.

text: Beyimizin emri budur. Aslıhan Hatun'u kurtaracağız.
english: This is our lord's order, we will save Aslihan Hatun.
You can't go back to the village without finding it.

text: Efendim, Helena en son kalede bir Türk'le görülmüş.
english: Sir, Helena was last seen with a Turk at the castle.
Don't come back until you get it!

text: Seninle dünyanın ucuna kadar yürürüm de yine bir şey demem.
english: I'll walk with you to the ends of the earth and say nothing again.

text: Lakin dünyanın ucunda ejderhalar var derler.
english: But they say there are dragons at the end of the world.
I'll build a bridge from the bones of that dragon.
I'll take you anywhere you want.

text: Hiç olmadı, postunu söker, kanat yaparım.
english: It never happened, I'll rip the post open and make a wing.

text: Pusatların olmasa dahi beni her daim koruyacağını bilirim Bamsı.
english: I know you'll always protect me, even if you don't have a ponytail.
I had something to tell you, didn't I?
...my father, may the land be plentiful...
...he entrusted you to our lord Ertuğrul.
When he heard that Vasilius was going to marry you...
...the river of our Lord Ertugrul is turned.

text: O adam tekinsizin tekidir der de başka bir şey demez.
english: He says he's one of your own and he's not saying anything else.
...that I'd see as the fault of that man...
...to draw a dagger from my heart.
My eyes seeing you with that man...
I'm not going to say anything else.
Tekfur Vasilius has ordered you, sir.
Okay, you tell me I'll be there in a minute.

text: Hemen gitmemiz gerek efendim. Sizi almadan dönemem.
english: We have to leave now, sir.
Or he said I'd come to you.
I got it. I got it.
I got it. I got it.
I got it. I got it.

text: Bir adım daha atarsan seni zindana atarım.
english: One more step and I'll put you in jail.
I'm telling you, let her go!
We found the blanket in these bushes, sir.

text: Aliyar, bu vadinin ucu bucağı yoktur.
english: Ally, there's no end of this valley.

text: Eğer başka bir iz daha bulamazsak sabaha kadar dolanırız.
english: If we don't find another lead, we'll be out by morning.

text: Alpler, dağılın etrafa, bir iz var mı bakın.
english: Alps, spread out, see if there's a trace.
(Applause) It didn't fall from the sky or this is the towel.

text: Buradan geçmiş olsalar mutlaka bir iz daha bulurduk.
english: If they'd been through here, we'd have found another trail.
As a matter of fact, my sister's handkerchief...
...like being thrown in here in a cage, bro.
Are you sure you found the mattress here?

text: Her vakit zekâna gıpta ettim Aliyar Bey.
english: I always thought it was smart, Mr. Aliyar.
If you were a gentleman instead of your father...

text: Vuslatımız uzun sürsün istemedim Ural Bey.
english: I didn't want our expedition to last long, Mr. Ural.

text: Sana bey demek bile içimden gelmez.
english: I can't even call you a gentleman.

text: Katil, aşağılık, ciğeri beş para etmez Ural.
english: Murderer, asshole, liver is not worth five Ural.
He sold his Alps to save himself.
...the Ural, washing all his sins upon him.

text: Demek mahkemede bütün suçu üstüme atıp kurtuldun ha?
english: So you just put all the blame on me in court and got away with it?

text: Sen hayatımda gördüğüm en adi adamsın.
english: You're the meanest man I've ever seen.

text: Sen değil miydin Ertuğrul'un Alplerini kılıçtan geçir diyen ha?
english: You didn't say to cut through Ertuğrul's Alps?

text: Ben senin emirlerini yerine getirdim Ural.
Toktamış Bey'i nasıl öldürdüğünü de bilsin Aliyar Bey.
english: And let him know how you killed the knock-off, Mr. Aliyar.

text: Aslıhan Hatun'la Halime Sultan'ı bile bile nasıl ölüme gönderdiğini de.
english: And how you sent Aslihan Khatun and Halime Sultan to their deaths knowingly.

text: (Batuhan) Hoş, bunların bir manası yok artık.
english: (Batuhan) That's nice, that doesn't make any sense anymore.

text: Ben buraya Candar Bey'in soyunu kurutmaya geldim.
english: I came here to dry up Mr. Candar's offspring.

text: ...babanızla uzun uzun yapıp ettiklerinizi konuşursunuz gayrı.
english: ...you talk to your father about what you've been doing for a long time.

text: Hiç kimsenin bulamayacağı emin bir yerde.
english: Somewhere safe no one can find it.

text: O kadar kolay değil Aliyar Bey. O kadar kolay değil.
english: It's not that easy, Mr. Aliyar.

text: İnsan mısın ayı mısın belli değil! Yürü!
english: It's not clear if he's a human or a bear.

text: Gelesiniz! Gelesiniz, teker teker alayım kellenizi!
english: Come on, let me get your necklace one by one!

text: Aha da böyle elimi kolumu bağlamadan bırakırsınız!
english: You're gonna let go of my hand without tying my arm!

text: Nasıl olsa buradan çıkacağım! Nasıl olsa buradan çıkacağım!
english: I'm getting out of here anyway!
You're gonna blow my head off!

text: Korkak itler! Korkak itler! Gelin hele!
english: The cowards, the cowards, come on!
(Laughter) I'm getting out of here anyway.
(Leaves) Come on, I'm going to get out of here!
I'd have broken your neck if I hadn't sworn.

text: Senin ve babanın bütün pisliklerini bilirim Ural.
english: I know all about you and your father's shit, Ural.

text: ...sen ve kardeşin hiçbir şeyden haberiniz olmadan büyüdünüz.
english: ...you and your brother grew up knowing nothing.

text: ...babanız ve abiniz bütün pis işlerinden uzak tuttu sizi.
english: ...your father and brother kept you from all the dirty work.

text: Birazdan öldüreceğim bir adama niye yalan söyleyeyim Ural, ha?
english: Why lie to a man I'm about to kill, Ural, huh?
He couldn't digest the market for Mr. Ertuğrul.

text: ...babanla bir olup pazar esnafını kılıçtan geçirmediniz mi?
english: ...didn't you and your father go through the sword trade?
Now put down your swords and...

text: ...temiz ve acısız bir ölüm sizinle olsun.
english: ...a clean and painless death with you.

text: Ya da geberene kadar acı içinde kıvranmanızı izleyeyim.
english: Or watch you twirl in pain until you die.

text: Son nefesimize kadar beyim. Allah yardımcımız olsun.
english: I'm a gentleman until the last breath.
